subSubSection.paragraph:
*
Sarscypridopsis aculeata
( Costa , 1847) McKenzie 1977 : AT, AU, NA, NT, PA

Syn.:

(fide Martens 1984 )

Syn.:

(fide
Martens et al. 1996
